Bits and bytes I've done and written

  • CCiPort - a video on demand platform

    Sept. 10th, 2009

    CCiPort is the final project for my MSc Digital Media course. It is a website that offers video on demand, live streaming and additional functionality for students and teachers.

  • The Thomas Edison project - The Night of the First Light

    June 24th, 2009

    A 3D animation I did with a couple of colleagues of mine from my MSc Digital Media course.

  • AUBG 2008 Yearbook

    May 12th, 2008

    The only serious design for print I've ever done.
